name: 2fas-browser-extension
description: This is the official Browser Extension for the Open Source 2FAS project.

scripts.chrome-dev: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.chrome-prod: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Chrome NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.opera-dev: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.opera-prod: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Opera NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.firefox-dev: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.firefox-prod: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Firefox NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.edge-dev: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.edge-prod: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Edge NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.safari-dev: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode development --progress --config webpack/development.config.js
scripts.safari-prod: yarn clean && yarn generate-locales && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && cross-env EXT_PLATFORM=Safari NODE_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/webpack --mode production --progress --config webpack/production.config.js
scripts.all-build: rimraf ./build/* && yarn generate-license-info && yarn chrome-build && yarn opera-build && yarn firefox-build && yarn edge-build
